glosses: A type of (phono)semantic reduplicative grammatical construction often involving nonsense words, words of similar meaning, onomatopoeia etc.

examples.text: "Çalı çırpı," biri anlamlı diğeri de anlamsız bir ikilemeye örnektir.
examples.translation: "Çalı çırpı" is an example of an semantic reduplication made of one real and one nonsensical word.

etymology: By surface analysis, ikile- (“double”) + -me (“deverbal suffix”), literally "a doubling"
